doc:
Allen Case https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Allen_Case 0 Allen Case (October 8, 1934 – August 25, 1986) was an American television actor most noted for the lead role of Deputy Clay McCord in NBC-TV's The Deputy (1959–1961) opposite series regular Henry Fonda, who received top billing but appeared far less frequently than Case. Allen_Case ( October_8_,_1934 – August_25_,_1986 ) was an_American_television_actor most_noted for the_lead_role of Deputy_Clay_McCord in NBC-TV 's_The_Deputy ( 1959 – 1961 ) opposite_series_regular_Henry_Fonda , who received top_billing but appeared far_less_frequently than Case .
